item.title: randa add a quote by Mohamad Sobary
item.description: "Tiap orang harus berani mengembara, mematangkan diri, memetik tiap pengalaman menjadi guru, yang akan memberi makna hidup lebih dalam, dan boleh pulang kelak, bila ia sudah cukup paham akan apa arti hidup. Dan itu semua hanya akan diperoleh di tempat yang jauh dari kampung halaman, yang tak pernah punya janji masa depan." -- Mohamad Sobary

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: randa add a quote by Ali bin Abi Thalib
item.description: "Kesempatan datang bagai awan berlalu, maka pergunakanlah selagi ia nampak di hadapanmu." -- Ali bin Abi Thalib

item.title: randa add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: randa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: randa add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: randa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein
